name: sentinelai-backend
description: Backend service for **SentinelAI**, an AI-assisted situational awareness plugin for CivTAK.   It ingests real-world data feeds (e.g. aviation, ground tracks, weather), keeps a live in-memory view of the world, and exposes an API that turns **natural language requests** into **map overlays** for the CivTAK plugin.

scripts.ec2-service-start: aws ssm get-command-invocation --command-id "$(aws ssm send-command --instance-ids "$(aws ec2 describe-instances --filters 'Name=tag:Name,Values=sentinelai' 'Name=instance-state-name,Values=running' --query 'Reservations[0].Instances[0].InstanceId' --output text)" --document-name AWS-RunShellScript --parameters commands='["sudo systemctl start sentinelai-backend.service"]' --query 'Command.CommandId' --output text)" --instance-id "$(aws ec2 describe-instances --filters 'Name=tag:Name,Values=sentinelai' 'Name=instance-state-name,Values=running' --query 'Reservations[0].Instances[0].InstanceId' --output text)" --query "StandardOutputContent" --output text
scripts.ec2-service-stop: aws ssm get-command-invocation --command-id "$(aws ssm send-command --instance-ids "$(aws ec2 describe-instances --filters 'Name=tag:Name,Values=sentinelai' 'Name=instance-state-name,Values=running' --query 'Reservations[0].Instances[0].InstanceId' --output text)" --document-name AWS-RunShellScript --parameters commands='["sudo systemctl stop sentinelai-backend.service"]' --query 'Command.CommandId' --output text)" --instance-id "$(aws ec2 describe-instances --filters 'Name=tag:Name,Values=sentinelai' 'Name=instance-state-name,Values=running' --query 'Reservations[0].Instances[0].InstanceId' --output text)" --query "StandardOutputContent" --output text
scripts.ec2-service-restart: aws ssm get-command-invocation --command-id "$(aws ssm send-command --instance-ids "$(aws ec2 describe-instances --filters 'Name=tag:Name,Values=sentinelai' 'Name=instance-state-name,Values=running' --query 'Reservations[0].Instances[0].InstanceId' --output text)" --document-name AWS-RunShellScript --parameters commands='["sudo systemctl restart sentinelai-backend.service"]' --query 'Command.CommandId' --output text)" --instance-id "$(aws ec2 describe-instances --filters 'Name=tag:Name,Values=sentinelai' 'Name=instance-state-name,Values=running' --query 'Reservations[0].Instances[0].InstanceId' --output text)" --query "StandardOutputContent" --output text
scripts.ec2-service-status: aws ssm get-command-invocation --command-id "$(aws ssm send-command --instance-ids "$(aws ec2 describe-instances --filters 'Name=tag:Name,Values=sentinelai' 'Name=instance-state-name,Values=running' --query 'Reservations[0].Instances[0].InstanceId' --output text)" --document-name AWS-RunShellScript --parameters commands='["sudo systemctl status sentinelai-backend.service"]' --query 'Command.CommandId' --output text)" --instance-id "$(aws ec2 describe-instances --filters 'Name=tag:Name,Values=sentinelai' 'Name=instance-state-name,Values=running' --query 'Reservations[0].Instances[0].InstanceId' --output text)" --query "StandardOutputContent" --output text
scripts.ec2-start: aws ec2 start-instances --instance-ids "$(aws ec2 describe-instances --filters 'Name=tag:Name,Values=sentinelai' --query 'Reservations[0].Instances[0].InstanceId' --output text)"
scripts.ec2-stop: aws ec2 stop-instances --instance-ids "$(aws ec2 describe-instances --filters 'Name=tag:Name,Values=sentinelai' --query 'Reservations[0].Instances[0].InstanceId' --output text)"
scripts.ec2-restart: aws ec2 stop-instances --instance-ids "$(aws ec2 describe-instances --filters 'Name=tag:Name,Values=sentinelai' --query 'Reservations[0].Instances[0].InstanceId' --output text)" && aws ec2 start-instances --instance-ids "$(aws ec2 describe-instances --filters 'Name=tag:Name,Values=sentinelai' --query 'Reservations[0].Instances[0].InstanceId' --output text)"
